message:

message:

Where `noise` is the name of the texture.
Can be combined with all the other texture parameters.

title: Made TabWidthSpan static to not leak memory
message:

kept a reference to its parent instance, the View, which
in turn has a reference to its Activity. And so neither
the View nor the Activity can get ever released.

title: Support custom texture parameters for each sampler
message:
Support custom texture parameters for each sampler

Use something like "///min:n;mag:l;s:c;t:c" after a sampler2D or
samplerCube to set parameters for glTexParameteri(). This way each
shader can define custom parameters for each sampler.

Also there's a widget to choose from the possible values when a

message:

title: Don't check findViewById() return values for null
message:
Don't check findViewById() return values for null

Given we test every change, findViewById() can only return null
in development but not in production. Once the wiring is correct,
findViewById() cannot fail.

Even worse, if findViewById() returns null because we make a
mistake while developing, there won't be a telling exception if
we check for null and just finish the activity.

title: Set view holder on item view
message:
Set view holder on item view

Somehow I forgot to actually set the view holder on
the item view. Shame.

title: Don't transfer shader query over config changes
message:
Don't transfer shader query over config changes

Don't keep a static (hard) reference to the latest Activity object
because that would keep the GC from recycling it long after its
use. Of course, it'd be possible to use a WeakReference and avoid
leaking that Activity, but there's really no point in worrying
about having a new configuration querying shaders again.

title: Transfer delayed results from background tasks
message:
Transfer delayed results from background tasks

Into the currently active UI object. When a device is rotated
while an AsyncTask is running, the result of that AsyncTask
should be transferred to the new Activity/Fragment.

The simplest way to do this is to use a static reference to
a private listener that is initialized in onCreate/View().
Since AsyncTask.onPostExectue() and onCreate()/onCreateView()
are both running on the main thread, they can never overlap
and the result is always realized in the latest active object.

title: Restored ScrollView around EditText
message:
Restored ScrollView around EditText

Yes, TextView can scroll already, but it's not possible to set a
padding on it's contents only. Instead, contents will be cut off
at the specified padding but before the visible border leaving
an ugly gap between text and border.

The only way to avoid this seems to be putting the TextView inside
a ScrollView.

title: Don't keep a reference to Context in DataSource
message:
Don't keep a reference to Context in DataSource

Lint complains because keeping a Context in a static place usually
leads to a memory leak. In this case, however, context was the
application context (which never gets garbage collected anyway).

Because it'd leave a bad smell, the reference was removed.

title: Set current shader as wallpaper shader
message:
Set current shader as wallpaper shader

Change the current wallpaper shader from inside the app.
If the current shader is the wallpaper shader, the menu
item will say "Update wallpaper". Otherwise it will read
"Set as wallpaper".

Note that this only works if Shader Editor is already set
as live wallpaper. Android doesn't allow apps to set a
live wallpaper directly (so we'd need to fire an intent
for the wallpaper chooser; but that's probably too much).

title: Advanced version number to 2.4.5
message: Advanced version number to 2.4.5

title: New setting to open preview activity in new task
message:
New setting to open preview activity in new task

Since FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK cannot be combined with
startActivityForResult(), see

https://developer.android.com/reference/android/content/Intent.html#FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK

  "This flag can not be used when the caller is requesting
   a result from the activity being launched."

and because FLAG_ACTIVITY_LAUNCH_ADJACENT does nothing
without FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK and FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK
causes multiple preview activities < Nougat, it's probably
best to have a dedicated setting for this.

So if you want support for Nougat's multi-window mode, you
need to choose "Run as a new task" in Settings -> Run Mode.

title: New second and subsecond uniform, changed ftime
message:
New second and subsecond uniform, changed ftime

To better cope with mediump float precision limitations,
there are two new uniforms: int second and float subsecond.
subsecond contains only the fractional part of the seconds
since start.

ftime ranges between -1.0 and +1.0 and wraps every PI seconds
now. This gives mediump devices a couple of opportunities to
avoid rounding errors.

title: Extra uniform to transfer fractional part of time
message:
Extra uniform to transfer fractional part of time

Since precision problems of a mediump float (time) arise
quite early. Transferring just the fractional part gives
more precision because the precision limitation for decimals
between -1.0 and +1.0 are much lower than with higher
decimals.

title: Added note about returning a mutable reference

message: Made inner class static

title: Make static members of application context final
message:
Make static members of application context final

Declaring the static members of the application context as
final is syntactically better because those members will
never change. The only reason they weren't final was, that
I preferred to make the objects only constructable with a
context object. Switched to late initialization because
it's probably more important to have the static members
to be final.

title: Open database in DataSource
message:
Open database in DataSource

Originally put in Application because of error handling.
But since there's nothing that can be done if the database
would not open, it's probably better to put that where it
belongs.

title: Removed unused imports
message: Removed unused imports

title: Removed double null check
message:
Removed double null check

The first check doesn't make much sense now.

title: Mark switch/case fall through as intentional
message: Mark switch/case fall through as intentional

title: Advanced version number to 2.3.1
message: Advanced version number to 2.3.1

title: Add READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission for API < 19
message:
Add READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission for API < 19

Required to import textures on API < 19 from gallery apps
that do not use grantUriPermission(). Later API's will not
see that permission.

Hard decision. I don't really want to add that permission
but people (on API's < 19, especially Samsung devices)
keep running into this limitation and I just don't see a
better way to fix this.

At the time of writing, about 25% of installs will be
affected by this and will need to manually confirm the
update containing this change.

title: Show texture name in texture view
message:
Show texture name in texture view

And cleaned up database functions dealing with textures.

title: Match texture menu item with uniform menu item
message:
Match texture menu item with uniform menu item

Better use "Add ..." pattern for both. I'm always tapping
on "Add uniform" because I'm thinking add texture.

title: Removed hyphen from texture name pattern
message:
Removed hyphen from texture name pattern

Hyphens are not allowed in GLSL names.

title: Null static member when service is destroyed
message:
Null static member when service is destroyed

Don't leak the old WallpaperService.Engine beyond
service death. Just a precaution. Shouldn't make
a difference.

title: Filter invalid characters from name input
message:
Filter invalid characters from name input

Only allow alphanumeric texture names with underscores and hyphens.

title: Allow underscores and hyphens in texture names
message:
Allow underscores and hyphens in texture names

Should filter characters in EditText to avoid invalid
names in the first place.

title: Updated badges for Google Play and F-Droid
message:
Updated badges for Google Play and F-Droid

Wish those guys would decide on a URL and keep it.

title: Added date/time and startRandom uniform
message:
Added date/time and startRandom uniform

New uniform vec4 date containing year, month, date and time
in seconds.

And uniform float startRandom initialized to a random value
at each load.

title: Clean up remains of static instance reference
message:
Clean up remains of static instance reference

Removed now unused static instance reference.

Reference to EditorFragment does not need to be static.

Reset static result members in PreviewActivity::onCreate().

title: Use static members to transfer fps and info log
message:
Use static members to transfer fps and info log

Better because it doesn't require a static reference to
MainActivity.

Can't use setResult() to transfer fps, info log and the thumbnail
because going back from the preview will result in RESULT_CANCELLED
and data is null no matter if setResult() was run before.

title: Made texture arrays final
message:
Made texture arrays final

Won't change so they should be final.

title: Fixed typo
message: Fixed typo

title: Initialize start time on surface change
message:
Initialize start time on surface change

It's probably more correct to reset the start time
whenever the surface changes. On Android < 5, this
means that showing or hiding the soft keyboard resets
the start time which is better.

Also moved onSurfaceChanged() before onDrawFrame()
because that is the order of execution.

title: Advanced version number to 2.3.0
message: Advanced version number to 2.3.0

title: Create sensor listeners on demand
message:
Create sensor listeners on demand

Only create sensor listener objects if they're used.

Maybe they should even be null'ed in unregisterListeners()
to drop unrequired listeners when browsing between shaders.

title: Fixed binding of multiple textures
message:
Fixed binding of multiple textures

The mapping between uniform locations and texture IDs was missing.
And glActiveTexture() was missing. Bad.

title: Exposure of light, pressure and proximity sensors
message:
Exposure of light, pressure and proximity sensors

Added missing sensors available down to minSdkVersion (API 9).

The proximity sensor very often only supports a binary "near"
or "far" measurement. The light sensor has very often only a
few levels too. And I guess many devices don't even have a
pressure sensor but anyway.

title: Transparent background color in error highlighting
message:
Transparent background color in error highlighting

Because EditText draws the cursor before the background of
Spannables, an opaque background color will make the cursor
disappear. There's an issue about that:

https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=172001

For the time being, the simplest solution is to make the
background color transparent. It may not be as eye-catching
as before but it's probably still good enough to clearly see
where the error is.

title: Expose magnetic field sensor
message:
Expose magnetic field sensor

Added a new uniform magnetic that exposes the geomagnetic
field strength along the x, y and z axis.

title: Advanced version number to 2.2.0
message: Advanced version number to 2.2.0

title: Added feature graphic SVG source
message: Added feature graphic SVG source

title: Fixed monitoring battery level
message:
Fixed monitoring battery level

The battery level was only updated when the GLSL program was
loaded which does only happen once in the wallpaper service.
Hence, a shader in a live wallpaper didn't get the current
battery level.

title: Hide checkbox if there's no calling activity
message:
Hide checkbox if there's no calling activity

The add uniform checkbox requires a calling activity that
evaluates the result.

title: Insert new uniform after last #endif block
message:
Insert new uniform after last #endif block

If there is no block of uniform statements already that is.

title: Moved quality spinner to the right/end
message:
Moved quality spinner to the right/end

Better for landscape mode or tablet displays.

title: Add uniforms by picking them form a list
message:
Add uniforms by picking them form a list

This is probably a lot better than enumerating available
uniforms in the new shader.

title: Drop glClear() to preserve pixel buffer
message:
Drop glClear() to preserve pixel buffer

According to the OpenGL ES specification, using the discard keyword
should not update the buffer. So glClear() needs to be dropped because
it clears the buffer between renders.

title: Set title after inserting a new shader
message:
Set title after inserting a new shader

Also, clear thumbnail when accepting text from other apps.

title: Only show update wallpaper if set as wallpaper
message:
Only show update wallpaper if set as wallpaper

Only show "Update wallpaper" menu item if the current shader
is set as wallpaper shader.

title: Cleaned up string resources
message:
Cleaned up string resources

And put in comments for easy mapping.

title: Ignore lint warning about typography fractions
message:
Ignore lint warning about typography fractions

All labels should look the same even if there are typography
fractions available for *some* of them.

title: Updated features
message: Updated features

title: Advanced version number to 2.1.0
message: Advanced version number to 2.1.0

title: Change render resolution/quality
message:
Change render resolution/quality

There's a spinner inside the toolbar to change render
resolution now. The chosen quality is stored with the
fragment shader in the database so it's possible to
set a preferred resolution for the wallpaper shader.

But the spinner is quite ugly. Searching for a better
way to it.

title: Basic checks and filtering for accepted text
message: Basic checks and filtering for accepted text

title: Fixed inserting sampler2D statement
message:
Fixed inserting sampler2D statement

The activity result needs to be set again in TexturesFragment
because picking a texture happens in a subsequent activity now.

title: Finish activity after removing texture
message:
Finish activity after removing texture

TextureViewFragment is no longer part of a fragment history
so the activity needs to be finished when the texture is
removed.

title: Cleaned up handling of PICK_IMAGE_REQUEST
message: Cleaned up handling of PICK_IMAGE_REQUEST

title: No need to re-initialize vertex buffer
message:
No need to re-initialize vertex buffer

The local vertex buffer may life beyond multiple surface
life cycles.

title: Simplified setting wallpaper shader
message: Simplified setting wallpaper shader

title: Improved setting of shader according to state
message:
Improved setting of shader according to state

Handle incoming text intents when there are no shaders.
Remain EditText state when selectedShaderId is 0.

title: Fixed order of methods
message:
Fixed order of methods

initSystemBars() is called before (and does call) setSystemBarColor().

title: Advanced version number to 2.0.3
message: Advanced version number to 2.0.3

title: Handle out of memory exception
message:
Handle out of memory exception

Don't try to get a bigger image for a better quality
cut out because that breaks on some of my devices.
Apparently, 2048px can already be too much.

title: Don't toast when not on the main thread
message: Don't toast when not on the main thread

title: Advanced version number to 2.0.2
message: Advanced version number to 2.0.2

title: Removed conway sample shader
message:
Removed conway sample shader

You need to touch the shader to see it working and
it's *very* slow on some devices. So it's probably
not a good sample.

title: Put ImageView's behind translucent system bars
message:
Put ImageView's behind translucent system bars

Looks better but takes more code.

App's get judged by the looks, so let's go for it.

title: Additional sample shaders
message:
Additional sample shaders

Added Conway's Game of Life and a demo shader using the
gravity uniform.

Also, all samples will get inserted in database version 1
to make them available when updating.

title: Improved wording of labels
message: Improved wording of labels

title: Better names for time constants
message:
Better names for time constants

Got confused and thought the time uniform would contain
milliseconds when in fact it contains seconds. So I tried
to clarify what the constants actually mean and removed
that wrapping (because it would only wrap after ~18 hours).

title: Fixed typo
message: Fixed typo

title: Refactored queryThings() into getThings()
message:
Refactored queryThings() into getThings()

To match the naming convention of all the other query
methods that return only one item. No reason to use
a different verb for bulk queries.

title: Advanced version number to 2.0.1
message: Advanced version number to 2.0.1

title: Cleaned up default shaders
message:
Cleaned up default shaders

Improved readability.

title: Changed order of initial shaders
message:
Changed order of initial shaders

It's probably better to have the simpler shader first.

title: Button to rotate source image for texture
message:
Button to rotate source image for texture

Good for photos using EXIF orientation data or just any image
you want to use with another orientation.

title: Intent filter for text/plain and image/*
message:
Intent filter for text/plain and image/*

Accept data from other apps. Can be used to import
textures or source code.

title: Removed apk target
message: Removed apk target

title: Removed infer rule
message:
Removed infer rule

Unfortunately, Infer isn't quite there yet.

It's a pain to install (compliation breaks with 0.4.0) and
(at least 0.2.0) can't see if you're closing a cursor in a
method and not in the current context:

	Cursor cursor = ...

	if( closeIfEmpty( cursor ) )
		return;

You can close the cursor in closeIfEmpty() but that won't
keep Infer from complaining. There are other situations
like when you're putting a cursor into an adapter that
trigger the same kind of warning altough you're calling
adapter.changeCursor( null ); to close it.

Looking for other static analysis tools.

title: Added a release target to build and sign
message: Added a release target to build and sign

title: Simplified showing toasts
message:
Simplified showing toasts

No need to add a tool method in just one fragment.

title: Remove color from drawer background
message:
Remove color from drawer background

A simple, translucent black probably works better on
colorful backgrounds.

title: Save thumbnail after preview activity did run
message:
Save thumbnail after preview activity did run

Makes sure the thumbnail is from the most recent run.

title: Fixed a crash when removing last shader
message:
Fixed a crash when removing last shader

Check source for null before use. It may very well be null
if there is no source availabe.

title: Show message when no textures are available
message: Show message when no textures are available

title: Setting to save on run
message:
Setting to save on run

Automatically save the source when running a shader manually.
This explicitly excludes auto running on change.

title: Set toolbar title if there is a selected shader
message:
Set toolbar title if there is a selected shader

After rotating the device, when the stored instance state
contains a selected shader ID, it's required to set the toolbar
title to the name of the shader.

title: Option to insert uniform sampler2D statement
message:
Option to insert uniform sampler2D statement

When importing a new texture, there's now a checkbox to
have the "uniform sampler2D name;" statement inserted for
you.

When viewing a texture, there's now a menu item to do
the same for the currently displayed texture.

title: Decreased margin of floating action bar
message:
Decreased margin of floating action bar

Looks better.

title: Setting to hide insert tab button
message:
Setting to hide insert tab button

I've got a hunch some people don't like tabs.
Those guys probably prefer to hide that button and
use the space for other menu icons.

title: Fixed ScaleType.CENTER_INSIDE for smaller images
message:
Fixed ScaleType.CENTER_INSIDE for smaller images

CENTER_INSIDE means the image is (proportionally) scaled
to the shorter dimension of the view. Before that change,
that was only true for images that have a larger length
than one dimension of the view.

title: Catch security exception when choosing an image
message:
Catch security exception when choosing an image

Content providers that do no grant permission for the transferred
image URI will cause a security exception. Samsung's image gallery
on the Galaxy Note 2 is such a bad example.

Since all other gallery apps I've tried so far (not too many) do
grant the permission, I chose to add a toast informing the user
to use another gallery app to pick the image.

If this problem has a broader scope, there's no way around
READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE what I would like to avoid because it's
a "dangerous permission" on Marshmallow and it's simply not
really required.

title: Removed unused texture file path option
message:
Removed unused texture file path option

Originally I played with the idea of using a texture
from a file path. But since textures need to have
dimensions of the power of two, that's probably too
hard to handle.

title: Better texture name hint
message: Better texture name hint

title: Refactored (texture) details to properties
message: Refactored (texture) details to properties

title: Updated documentation in new shader source
message: Updated documentation in new shader source

title: Refuse textures named backbuffer
message:
Refuse textures named backbuffer

To avoid collision with the built-in back buffer texture.

title: Fixed version code
message:
Fixed version code

Advanced too far. There never was a version 13 so far.

title: Updated features and description
message:
Updated features and description

Also removed screen shot. I need a better one.

title: Moved toggle code before save in menu
message:
Moved toggle code before save in menu

I *think* toggle code is required more often than save.
May be wrong. We'll see.

title: Uniform status and navigation bar color
message:
Uniform status and navigation bar color

All activities, except the extra preview activity, do now
share the same status and navigation bar color.

title: Menu item to insert tab character
message:
Menu item to insert tab character

Brought back the menu item to insert a tab character.
Works better for me.

title: Moved settings from drawer into menu
message:
Moved settings from drawer into menu

It's probably a bit confusing having settings in the
drawer at the left (start) and the rest of the options
in the overflow menu at the right (end).

Then, when the keyboard is visible, the list of shaders
becomes quite small on small screens or landscape with
additional menu items in the drawer.

After trying the textures menu item in the drawer, it
became quite clear, that the drawer should only contain
the list of shaders and nothing else.

title: Show toast just below toolbar
message:
Show toast just below toolbar

Because the default position at the bottom of the display
interferes with the keyboard while editing.

title: Use a dark gray for transparent drawer background
message:
Use a dark gray for transparent drawer background

Looks better when the shader is running in an extra
activity.

title: Show errors and fps when running in extra activity
message:
Show errors and fps when running in extra activity

Show error messages (if any) and frames per second in
MainActivity when the shader is running in PreviewActivity.

Also fixed order of some public methods.

title: Fixed indent
message: Fixed indent

title: Use wrap_content instead of a fixed height
message: Use wrap_content instead of a fixed height

title: Use Android naming convention
message: Use Android naming convention

title: Save texture in a background task
message:
Save texture in a background task

And show a progress bar while doing so.

title: Use fully qualified symbol name
message:
Use fully qualified symbol name

Since we're calling ScalingImageView::getRectInBounds(),
it's better to use a fully qualified symbol name.

title: Changed expression to match with other occurences
message: Changed expression to match with other occurences

title: Inspect already imported textures
message:
Inspect already imported textures

Tapping on a texture from the list will open a texture
viewer now.

Removing a texture also went into this activity.

title: Translucent navigation bar on Lollipop and higher
message:
Translucent navigation bar on Lollipop and higher

Having a translucent status bar is only half of the story.

title: Generic error messages if creating a shader fails
message:
Generic error messages if creating a shader fails

Shouldn't ever happen but you never know.

title: Use a Toast to display GLSL error message
message:
Use a Toast to display GLSL error message

Probably far better than using a hidden layout because
it won't trigger a re-layout. What makes the cursor in
the editor jump.

The pre Material Design version used a pop up window
because I thought it would be bad if the error message
vanishes by itself. On the other hand, the user can
recompile at any time so that's probably not a big
problem.

title: Updated build tools and app compat
message: Updated build tools and app compat

title: Don't reset editor content on orientation change
message:
Don't reset editor content on orientation change

selectedShaderId should correspond to the instance
state and can therefore not be static.

This solves the problem of the editor loosing cursor
position and any unsaved text on orientation changes
because the content was always set anew for every
new activity instance.

title: Removed debug logging
message: Removed debug logging

title: Better use a JPG screenshot
message:
Better use a JPG screenshot

Size matters.

title: Show a screenshot
message: Show a screenshot

title: Added a CONTRIBUTORS file
message: Added a CONTRIBUTORS file

title: Try to get the highest available precision
message: Try to get the highest available precision

title: Nudged the cursor a tiny bit to the right
message: Nudged the cursor a tiny bit to the right

title: Import and use textures from images on the device
message:
Import and use textures from images on the device

There's a basic texture manager you can use to add new
textures from local image files. Every texture needs
to have a unique name.

Use that name in a sampler2D input to use the texture
from a shader.

title: Use latest appcompat libraries
message: Use latest appcompat libraries

title: Use full name for fragment shader symbol
message:
Use full name for fragment shader symbol

In case I find enough time to support models and editing
the vertex shader.

title: Use default shared preferences
message: Use default shared preferences

message: Close activity on navigate up (top left arrow)

title: Fixed typo
message: Fixed typo

title: Updated to use latest build tools
message: Updated to use latest build tools

title: Restart rendering when the device is plugged in
message:
Restart rendering when the device is plugged in

The docs are a bit unclear what BATTERY_OKAY really means.
According to my tests, BATTERY_OKAY is not sent when the
device is plugged in. Not even when the power level raised
above BATTERY_LOW.

So it's probably a good idea to listen for
ACTION_POWER_CONNECTED too.

title: Fixed passing array of pointers
message:
Fixed passing array of pointers

Of course, the array of pointers should be passed as an array
of vec3's and not as a matrix. What fool wrote this code? :)

title: Use TARGET in all rules running adb
message: Use TARGET in all rules running adb

title: Use v7 preference support library
message:
Use v7 preference support library

Unfortunately, PreferenceFragmentCompat doesn't look like
PreferenceFragment yet.

title: Updated to latest appcompat version
message: Updated to latest appcompat version

title: Lowered visibility of some Activity methods
message:
Lowered visibility of some Activity methods

Doesn't make much difference but it's always better
to keep the visibility as low as possible.

title: Cleaned up and fixed a typo
message: Cleaned up and fixed a typo

title: Updated outdated links
message: Updated outdated links

title: Highlight preprocessor directives
message: Highlight preprocessor directives

title: Better names for Shader and ShaderError
message:
Better names for Shader and ShaderError

What was a Shader object is really a shader Program object.

And error messages are not just errors, but info logs as
they are called by the OpenGL doc.

title: Fixed preparing options menu
message: Fixed preparing options menu

title: Fixed loading of shaders after removal
message:
Fixed loading of shaders after removal

Don't use obsolete adapter after a shader was removed from
the database.

title: Destroy shader program for empty shaders
message: Destroy shader program for empty shaders

title: Use highp where available
message:
Use highp where available

According to the spec, GL_FRAGMENT_PRECISION_HIGH is only
defined if highp is available. highp is optional, default
is mediump.

title: Intercept all events when touch should go through
message:
Intercept all events when touch should go through

Otherwise pointer move events can cause a crash.

title: Fixed manifest receiver constant
message:
Fixed manifest receiver constant

While the docs say, you should use ACTION_BATTERY_LOW when
registering the broadcast receiver in the manifest, what you
really should do is use the value of the constant which is
BATTERY_LOW.

title: Wrap time value at exactly 60 seconds
message:
Wrap time value at exactly 60 seconds

Makes possibly more sense.

title: Better use ContextCompat.getColor()
message:
Better use ContextCompat.getColor()

Resources.getColor( int ) is deprecated from API 23 on.

title: Moved handling of menu items into MainActivity
message:
Moved handling of menu items into MainActivity

Less complex and gives better control.

For example, when the users prefers to run the shader in an
extra activity but toggled off the sources, it's now possible
to make the code visible after changing the preference.

title: Turn wallpaper black when battery is low
message: Turn wallpaper black when battery is low

title: Updated to API 23
message:
Updated to API 23

Android Marshmallow!

title: Use postfix for asynchronous methods
message:
Use postfix for asynchronous methods

Makes asynchronous methods stand out.

title: Better keep old behaviour of touch/mouse uniforms
message:
Better keep old behaviour of touch/mouse uniforms

Don't reset touch/mouse coordinates when there's no touch.
The coordinates need to be somewhere and resetting them
would be just wrong.

If you want to recognize ACTION_UPs, use the pointer* uniforms.

title: Support multiple touches
Fixed duplicating shader & generating thumbnails
message:
Fixed duplicating shader & generating thumbnails

Generate a thumbnail when running in another activity too.

title: Run shader in extra activity
message:
Run shader in extra activity

Some people don't like having the shader running behind
the code so there's a setting to run the shader in an
extra activity now.

title: Wrap time variable
message:
Wrap time variable

Time holds the number of milliseconds since the creation of the
OpenGL surface. This number can get quickly very big what pretty
soon will result in rounding errors because a mediump float is
not very long.

When that happens, results from calculations that rest on the
uniformity of the time variable will jump. The animation stutters.

To avoid this, the time variable wraps early now.

title: Use a dedicated wallpaper thumbnail icon
message:
Use a dedicated wallpaper thumbnail icon

One size fits all (nodpi) because there's no size specification.
It really depends on the launcher. So one image of reasonable
size will do.

title: Rephrased to be more inviting
message: Rephrased to be more inviting

title: F-Droid badge, CONTRIBUTING and LICENSE file
message: F-Droid badge, CONTRIBUTING and LICENSE file

title: Material Design refactoring
message:
Material Design refactoring

New design, new layout, and a lot of improvements:

* use a drawer layout instead of a spinner
* editor is now in a fragment
* use icons from the Material Design icon library
* better database management
* close all cursors
* fewer allocations
* better preference management
* improved sensor listeners
* improved adapters
* removed broken zoom/pinch to adjust font size
* new material launcher icon
* minify release builds

title: Removed dependency for appcompat
message:
Removed dependency for appcompat

appcompat was added in preparation for the upcomming UI rework.
Will be added again as soon as there are classes that use it.

title: Update wallpaper shader from menu
message:
Update wallpaper shader from menu

Quickly update the shader running in the live wallpaper from
the current source.

title: Converted to gradle
message:
Converted to gradle

Because gradle has become the de facto standard for Android.

Personally I think gradle is unnecessarily complex and far too slow
but there's not really a choice anymore.

Also refactored classes into a more mature structure.

title: Merge pull request #8 from stuartpb/patch-1
message:
Merge pull request #8 from stuartpb/patch-1

glsl.heroku.com has moved

message:
glsl.heroku.com has moved

It's GLSL Sandbox now

title: Added open source license
message: Added open source license

title: Advanced version number for release
message: Advanced version number for release

title: Bind texture again for drawing into framebuffer
message:
Bind texture again for drawing into framebuffer

Some drivers (e.g. on the Fairphone 1) require binding
the texture again after glDrawArrays() was called for
some reason.

Also removed the depth buffer of the framebuffer since
it's completely unnecessary for what this app does.

The backbuffer texture is cleared before use now.
Some drivers start with uninitialized texture data.

title: Removed unnecessary imports
message: Removed unnecessary imports

title: Removed proguard template
message: Removed proguard template

title: Advanced version number
message: Advanced version number

title: Show overflow icon in action bar for Lollipop
message:
Show overflow icon in action bar for Lollipop

Since some devices don't show nor have a menu button
to open the shader menu, it's vital to have a overflow
icon in the action bar to open the menu.

title: Advanced version for release
message: Advanced version for release

title: Show source if it's hidden and there's an error
message:
Show source if it's hidden and there's an error

Tapping on the bug symbol when the source is hidden
does now show the source.

Useful when compile-on-change is disabled, the source
is edited, get's hidden and then compiled.

title: Advanced version for release
message: Advanced version for release

title: Updated comments with latest features
message:
Updated comments with latest features

Added battery and rotation values.

Gave a sample for how to access the backbuffer.

title: Refactored gyroscope for rotation
message:
Refactored gyroscope for rotation

The value contains rotation values.

title: Concat rotation delta instead of multiplication
message:
Concat rotation delta instead of multiplication

Since rotation.xys starts with 0, multiplying by 0 doesn't
give anything of course.

title: Added proper line-breaks
message:
Added proper line-breaks

So it's better to read on the console.

title: Use fixed alpha for low pass filter
message:
Use fixed alpha for low pass filter

Previous calculation was wrong. t is the low pass' filter
time constant (!) and dT is the event delivery rate in nano
seconds.

Chose to use a constant for now (and to ignore delta time).

title: Fixed y-flipped rendering when using a frame buffer
message:
Fixed y-flipped rendering when using a frame buffer

If the texture frame buffer (backbuffer) is rendered first,
rendering to frame buffer 0 (the screen) next will result in
a flipped image (on the y axis).

Maybe that's because rendering into a texture is (by default?)
y-flipped because a textures origin (0/0) is always in the
bottom left. And maybe the transformation matrix does not get
reset on glBindFramebuffer( GL_FRAMEBUFFER, 0 ).

Anyway, rendering into frame buffer 0 first does fix the
problem.

title: Support for gyroscope and battery
message: Support for gyroscope and battery

title: Updated version number
message: Updated version number

title: Remove trailing white space on save
message: Remove trailing white space on save

title: Improved auto indenting
message:
Improved auto indenting

It's more suitable to check for certain characters than to indent always
in the middle of the line. Still, this is a very simple approximation to
auto indenting but it should do in this context.

title: Fixed resetting of soft keyboard
message:
Fixed resetting of soft keyboard

At first, I don't need to call setText() to update the text. It's enough
to change the Editable.

TextView.setText() will restart the InputMethodManager which will reset
the soft keyboard.

Second, don't use Editable.clearSpans() as it will remove too much.
Removing only the spans I added is enough.

title: Get fps view every time anew instead of saving it
message:
Get fps view every time anew instead of saving it

It's better to not save the view returned for R.id.fps because it's
impossible to know when Spinner does change the selected view; especially
when the adapter changes which may update the spinner not immediately.

Anyway, getSelectedView() and findViewById() are just lookups and this
method is only called every ShaderRenderer.FPS_UPDATE_FREQUENCY milliseconds
and if fps did actually change so that shoudln't be problem
